content.html: Also, if you're a white person who wants to embrace diversity as a way forward, that's great. But you should understand that you can never be fully embraced by other ethnicities while white supremacy is still rampant. You will be forever caught in that gap in-between.
content.value:
Also, if you're a white person who wants to embrace diversity as a way forward, that's great.

But you should understand that you can never be fully embraced by other ethnicities while white supremacy is still rampant. You will be forever caught in that gap in-between.
